article.class: post-32 page type-page status-publish hentry no-post-thumbnail

p.em:
Re/Max Absolute
Sam Moussa Realty. Inc. Brokerage.

hr.div:
A passionate residential and commercial Ottawa Real Estate Agent - Sam Moussa is dedicated to uniting those with their dream homes at an affordable solution.
With one of the most locally trusted referral bases, Sam Moussa is dedicated to local buyers and sellers in obtaining their real estate Ottawa goals.
Whether it's an upsize or downsize, Sam Moussa is here to deliver results to your expectations timely and professionally.
** Named TOP 100 Agents in Canada (2019-2020)
** Top 1% of 2019 & 2020
** 2020 Titan Award
** Named #1 in Ottawa Commercial for Remax
** Named #21 in Canada for Remax Commercial
** Chairman's Award 2018 & 2019

Are you a first-time home buyer? A seasoned seller? Either way, selling or buying a home in Ottawa is a major decision that can require much research and careful preparation.
With so many homes and buyers out there, it is often difficult and time-consuming to find the right home and/or buyer. Here at the Sam Moussa Team, we take all the guess work and effort out of your home buying/selling experience, with proven sales strategies and excellent client care service.
Let us do all the heavy lifting for you!
